name: UltraBounce!
description:
Welcome to UltraBounce!

Swipe and bounce your way through 75 challenging levels in the stunning and majestic world of UltraBounce.

Be careful how you swipe because the longer you swipe the higher the bounce while the shorter you swipe the lower the bounce.

** HOW TO PLAY **

Swipe to control the angle and height of the bounce
The longer you swipe the higher the bounce
The shorter you swipe the lower the bounce


** GAME FEATURES **

◉ 75 hand crafted levels
◉ Powerups
◉ 15 balls to unlock
◉ One thumb control
◉ Simplistic yet stunning visuals
◉ Quick restarts
◉ Leaderboard & Achievements
◉ Chilled out ambient soundtrack

Good luck and have fun!
